4E800421 C0A1000C
ECA5282A D0BE0108
80010014 7C0803A6
38210010 4E800020

The main light source of maps cycles through red, green and blue.

 ⚠ Start a new race to fully disable.
 ⚠ May cause performance issues.

Info:
Line 3 determines the RGB cycle speed. (Default: 3C75C28F)
Line 4 is the starting address of variables used by this code. (Default: 10014820)
 ⚠ If this address is changed, don't forget to change the undo codeline (Line 1) to the same address.

Game Version: 4.2
TCP Gecko Version: 2.53

Modes Supported:
 • Battle (Offline / Online)
 • Grand Prix
 • Time Trials
 • VS Race (Offline / Online)

Default Data Used:
0x10014820 (20 bytes)

Source:
https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
